name: Leap of leaf
description:
Hello and thanks for showing interest in Leap of Leaf! 

- I really hope you enjoy it! -

I am developing Leap of Leaf solo as a hobby.

One day I hope to make games full time...

Please consider supporting me on my gamedev journey :D

Thanks again!

- Andy -
